name: Alice3GDX
description:
A submission for the libGDX game jam. The theme was, Alice In Wonderland.

Can you discover the secrets of the wonderland? There aren't many...

Notes

  • This is an online game. For whatever reason, your ad-block may not like my server, so please turn that off.
  • The only controls are W,A,S,D, and mouse moving. I truly apologize if you have a differently laid out keyboard, you cannot rebind the keys.
  • This is more of a tech demo, so all you can do is move around and spin. Join with your friends!

created by @DeveloperDoge
